'''''Sea of Puzzles''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 4 Light-Up Tile Puzzles around [[Seirai Island]], not counting the ones inside {{LL|"Seiraimaru"|.}}
